translations: n.妖怪；令人害怕的事物（bogy 的复数）

sentences.sentence: It is largely applied on light rail vehicles and gauge-changeable bogies recently.
sentences.translation: 近年来已在轻轨车辆上和变轨距转向架上得到大量应用。

sentences.sentence: Turntables can be installed to assist in the removal of the bogies to other maintenance areas.
sentences.translation: 还应有转向架转盘将转向架送到其他维修区域去。

sentences.sentence: System reliability model was established after getting life distribution rules of critical parts of bogies.
sentences.translation: 在得到摆式转向架关键零部件的寿命分布规律后建立了摆式转向架的系统可靠性模型。
